Testcase

When setting border-right on fo:inline the border is not visible in PDF output if hyhpenation is activated.

Could somebody fix this please? Example file is attached.

Thanks

This is due to one of the myriad details in the layout engine: the index of auxiliary positions must be -1 (meaning no value). This was not respected in InlineStackingLM.applyChanges, when it rewraps the positions.

Fixed in revision 1050342.
